# Cypress Test Fixtures

This directory contains JSON fixtures for Cypress E2E tests.

## `tasks.json`

**⚠️ Important: This file is generated from centralized test data.**

The source of truth is `tests/fixtures/testTasks.ts`. To update this file:

1. Update `tests/fixtures/testTasks.ts`
2. Run: `npm run test:sync-fixtures`

**Do not manually edit this file** - it will be overwritten when you sync fixtures.

For more information, see the [Testing Guide](../../docs/TESTING.md) and [Test Fixtures README](../../tests/fixtures/README.md).
